Description: Upper section of a green serpentine shabti of Wedjarenes, the wife of Mentuemhat, with a lappet-wig, a modelled face(chipped) and parallel hands holding two incised implements and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is lost, two rows of Hieroglyphic text survive.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Mrs L V Hallas
